name: ListUtils_removeAllTest
description: Unit tests for the removeAll method in ListUtils.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAll_NormalCase
test_cases.description: Tests the removeAll method with a normal case where elements are removed from the list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAll_NoElementsToRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the removeAll method when there are no elements to remove from the list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAll_AllElementsToRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the removeAll method when all elements are to be removed from the list.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAll_NullCollection
test_cases.description: Tests the removeAll method when the collection is null, expecting a NullPointerException.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAll_NullRemove
test_cases.description: Tests the removeAll method when the remove list is null, expecting a NullPointerException.
